```{rosmose} 
fresh_milk_massflow_ref = 8 [kg/s] # Nominal capacity for sizing multiplier definition  
#beer_massflow_act = 30 [kg/s] # Actual capacity for sizing multiplier definition  https://www.the-top-twenty.com/the-top-20-biggest-brewery-companies-in-the-world/
cream_flow_ref  = 0.55 [kg/s] # Cream
milk_flow_ref  = 7.52 [kg/s] # Milk
thickener_flow_ref  = 0.07 [kg/s] # Thickener
wastewater_flow_ref  = 1 [kg/s] # Wastewater
whey_flow_ref  =  1.52 [kg/s] #  Whey production
concentrated_milk_flow_ref = 1.32 [kg/s] # Concentrated milk production
steam_evap_flow_ref = 0.0366 [kg/s] # Steam needed to evaporate the milk
water_dryers_flow_ref = 0.63 [kg/s] # Water exiting the drum dryers
make_up_water_flow_ref = 1.2 [kg/s] # Water added in the cleaning in place phase
bottle_flow_rate_ref = 6.6412698 [kg/s] # Mass of the bottles cleaned per second
water_to_lake_flow_ref = 1.2 [kg/s] # Water released into the lake after the cleaning in place
air_cold_storage_flow_ref = 100 [kg/s] #Air
hot_water_flow_ref = 1 [kg/s] # Hot water
discharge_flow_ref = 21 [kg/s] # Wastewater discharge
sludge_flow_ref = 0.1174 [kg/s] # Sludge produced
aroma_flow_ref = 0.0304 [kg/s] #Aroma added
water_rivella_6_flow_ref = 1.102024 [kg/s] #Water obtained from the Rivella production phase
water_rivella_11_flow_ref = 0.044838 [kg/s] # Water used to produce green Rivella
fruit_sugar_flow_ref =  0.044838 [kg/s] # Fruit sugar used to produce green Rivella
sugar_flow_ref = 0.183087 [kg/s] # Sugar used to produce red Rivella
water_rivella_18_flow_ref = 0.026155 [kg/s] # Water used to produce red Rivella
bio_degradable_waste_flow_ref = 0.1174 [kg/s] # Biodegradable waste produced in the digester phase
biogas_flow_ref = 0.0014 [kg/s] # Biogas produced in the digester phase
waste_water_digester_flow_ref = 0.0876 [kg/s] # Wastewater produced in the digester phase
super_heat_steam_flow_ref = 0.7244 [kg/s] #Superheated steam used in the digester phase
#add slightly super heat steam when corrected
dryed_digestate_flow_ref = 0.0156 [kg/s] # Dryed digestate produced in the digester phase
slightly_super_heated_steam = 0.7372 [kg/s] # Slightly superheated steam produced in the digester phase
water_density =  1000 [kg/m3] # Water density
CO2_density = 0.0019 [kg/m3] # CO2 density
powder_dryers_flow_ref = 0.69 [kg/s] # Powdered milk production in the drum dryers phase
dt_min  = 5 [K] #
#n = 40.0 [yr] #lifetime of a plant
#i = 0.06 [-] #interest rate
#CEPCI_2020 = 596.2 [-] # actual CEPCI
#CEPCI_2020 = 596.2 [-] # CEPCI 2008
```

The calculated parameters are defined as follows:

```{rosmose} 
#mult_brew   = %beer_massflow_act%/%beer_massflow_ref% [-] # Sizing multiplier
#beer_volflow  = %beer_massflow_ref%/%beer_density%*3600 [m3/h] # referece beer volumetric flow
#maltflow  = %maltflow_ref%*3600 [kg/h] # Malt
#cornflow  = %cornflow_ref%*3600 [kg/h] # Corn
#water_volflow = %waterflow_ref%/%water_density%*3600 [m3/h] # Water
#sodaflow  = %sodaflow_ref%*3600 [kg/h] # Soda
#husk_waste = %huskflow_ref%*3600 [kg/h] # Husk spent grain to the biodigestion process
#CO2_excess = %CO2_from_ferm%*%CO2_excess_factor%*%beer_massflow_ref%*3600 [kg/h]

#fresh_milk_massflow = %fresh_milk_massflow_ref%*3600 [kg/h]
#cream_flow = %cream_flow_ref%*3600 [kg/h]

#milk_flow = %milk_flow_ref%*3600 [kg/h]

```

## Brewery Process Units {-}

The dairy process contains the following units

```{rosmose}
: OSMOSE UNIT breweryprocess

|unit name      |type   |
|:--------------|:------|
|Pasteurisation |Process|
|Evaporation    |Process|
|Drum_Dryers    |Process|
|Cleaning_Place |Process|
|Cold_Storage   |Process|
|Hot_Water      |Process|
|Wastewater     |Process|
|Rivella        |Process|
|Digester       |Process| 
```





## Pasteurisation {-}

```{rosmose}
: OSMOSE UNIT_PARAM Pasteurisation
|cost1|cost2|cinv1|cinv2|imp1|imp2|fmin|fmax|
|:----|:----|:----|:----|:---|:---|:---|:---|
|0    |0    |0    |0    |0   |0   |1   |1   |
```

**Pasteurization Streams**

<!--DTmin is 5
Hin is 0 if it is heating up
Hout is 0 if it is cooling down
H is mdot*Q-->

The heat Streams:

```{rosmose}
: OSMOSE HEAT_STREAMS Pasteurisation
#All H in kJ/kg/s
#: OSMOSE HEAT_STREAMS HotPart_Batch1

|:------------|:-----|:------|:-------|:-------|:-------|:----|
|Fresh_Milk   |6.00  |60.00  |0       |13049.84|2.5     |1    |
|Cream_0      |60.00 |4.00   |60.465  |0       |2.5     |1    |
|Milk         |60.00 |4.00   |14182.87|0       |2.5     |1    |
```
